channel.title: Exillius 718
channel.description:
[center]Hey guys finally back from an extended period away from RSPS we are hoping to get back into the game. Starting off with our new project Exillius. Below is just a mini preview of what's added into the server. I will also give a heads up of what's to come Join us to test out all the new content and win amazing prizes while were still in Beta.
http://www.exillius.com
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CXbNkBh.jpg[/img]
I will be adding more pics of the server as we go along and a detailed update log of how we are progressing.
As for what you should expect - Brand New minigame called Extreme wars / and also League Wars its currently being tested with extreme Donators only It will be a public game in no time the main concept of league wars is for different types of cults to fight eachother also known as Leages Join 1 of your favourite Gods guilds and wreak havoc all over, spread your name.
- More prestiges, The higher your prestige the more XP you could gain the faster you could get a 200M XP skill and the more benefits you can acquire.
Lots more to come Visit the website for more details [img]http://www.rspscoding.org/img2.php?id=1555938318.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: Exillius 718
item.dc:creator: @Princess_Daisy Princess Daisy
item.description:
@Princess_Daisy wrote:

I Have been playing for a month now, This is freaking awesome. The 718 has a very good eco system, and the minigames are fun, Much to keep you busy  ;)   and the 317 Is very old school!! :D The staff are funny and skilling/pking is fun too ^-^ I am having a blast!!1 Peoples join us!!! The more people we get, the more fun it will be :D

Join soon

Read full topic

item.title: Exillius 718
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“TimeRS3, post:7, topic:541922”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=660793.msg4420002#msg4420002 date=1397969605]
If you have been gone for a while, how do you have dungeoneering all the sudden?
[/quote]

Using Roma 718 as our base and building our way up from there.[/quote]
Ah.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Exillius 718
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

arham 4:

If you have been gone for a while, how do you have dungeoneering all the sudden?

Using Roma 718 as our base and building our way up from there. Although I dont expect anyone to see it as full dungeoneering yet. I want to further expand it we need more rooms within each floor and I need to make all types of bosses apear for each type of floor. Right now each floors consists of just 3 rooms and a boss room with minimal equipment and 1 boss per floor only. No where near complete if you get my point.

btw did you delete me from skype or did i delete you i dont even know cause i was looking at my skype seeing who to add into my skype chat for advertising lol

Read full topic

item.title: Exillius 718
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

If you have been gone for a while, how do you have dungeoneering all the sudden?

item.title: Exillius 718
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

Princess Daisy:

This is freaking awesome!!! :eek: Simply [shadow=red,left]OUTSTANDING!!![/shadow]

bump

-Added prestige system back you can now go up to prestige 8 shops are being worked on
-still perfect eco working very hard to maintain it.
-Lending items 1-24hours
-Clancape customization added (This is to further progress with the new league wars minigame)
-Highscores being worked out decided to do in game highscores atm.
-Dwarf canons added 3 types regular, Royal, Golden
-Working on new emotes
-Working on more dungeoneering rooms for the 5 floors we currently have
-New home finally finished but still being constructed on with more stuff. (Now has its on pk box) / 3 different areas to travel to within home Portal section, Shops Section *this is where ge is, extreme left side of home now contains the noticeboard with updates list and also 3 npc that are for slayer and player customization and farming.

LOTS MORE TO COME

Read full topic

item.title: Exillius 718
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

You can now make your own clan cape and customise your clan banner to placed anywhere if another clan isn’t already taking that area.

Each banner is lasted up to 24 hours so other clans have a chance to take the area they want.

Read full topic
